jarvis.analysis.spillage package¶

Submodules¶

jarvis.analysis.spillage.spillage module¶

Code to calculate spin-orbit spillage. Please cite the following paper if you use the code: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-019-45028-y https://www.nature.com/articles/s41524-020-0319-4
